headline: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (KDP): I Just Can’t Make Sense Of Its Big Business Decision, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 14 Latest Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer isn’t a fan of Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) lately after the firm announced that it would buy coffee company JDE Peet and then proceed to split into two entities. […]

headline: Nutrabolt boosts stake in Bloom Nutrition with nearly $160M investment
summary: The C4 Energy drink maker, Bloom’s largest investor, said the deal will help it attract a broader customer base.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Shares Hold Buy Rating Despite JDE Peet’s Acquisition Concerns
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) ranks among the most active stocks to buy according to Wall Street analysts. On August 27, UBS reduced Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP)’s price target to $35 from $40, while retaining a Buy rating on the company’s shares, following the the beverage manufacturer’s announcement of plans to purchase JDE Peet’s. […]
